A text builder for SpriteText and other text-based display components.

Constructors

TextBuilder(ITexturedGlyphLookupStore, FontUsage, float, bool, Vector2, Vector2, List<TextBuilderGlyph>, char[], char, char)

Creates a new TextBuilder.

public TextBuilder(ITexturedGlyphLookupStore store, FontUsage font, float maxWidth = 3.4028235E+38, bool useFontSizeAsHeight = true, Vector2 startOffset = default, Vector2 spacing = default, List<TextBuilderGlyph> characterList = null, char[] neverFixedWidthCharacters = null, char fallbackCharacter = '?', char fixedWidthReferenceCharacter = 'm')

Parameters

store ITexturedGlyphLookupStore

The store from which glyphs are to be retrieved from.

font FontUsage

The font to use for glyph lookups from store.

maxWidth float

The maximum width of the resulting text bounds.

useFontSizeAsHeight bool

True to use the provided font size as the height for each line. False if the height of each individual glyph should be used.

startOffset Vector2

The offset at which characters should begin being added at.

spacing Vector2

The spacing between characters.

characterList List<TextBuilderGlyph>

That list to contain all resulting TextBuilderGlyphs.

neverFixedWidthCharacters char[]

The characters for which fixed width should never be applied.

fallbackCharacter char

The character to use if a glyph lookup fails.

fixedWidthReferenceCharacter char

The character to use to calculate the fixed width width. Defaults to 'm'.

Fields

Characters

The characters generated by this TextBuilder.

public readonly List<TextBuilderGlyph> Characters

Field Value

List<TextBuilderGlyph>

Properties

Bounds

The bounding size of the composite text.

public Vector2 Bounds { get; }

Property Value

Vector2

CanAddCharacters

Whether characters can be added to this TextBuilder.

protected virtual bool CanAddCharacters { get; }

Property Value

bool

LineBaseHeight

Gets the current base height of the text in this TextBuilder.

public float LineBaseHeight { get; }

Property Value

float

Exceptions

InvalidOperationException

Thrown when attempting to access this property on a TextBuilder with multiple lines added.

Methods

AddCharacter(char)

Appends a character to this TextBuilder.

public bool AddCharacter(char character)

Parameters

character char

The character to append.

Returns

bool

Whether characters can still be added.

AddNewLine()

Adds a new line to this TextBuilder.

public void AddNewLine()

Remarks

A height equal to that of the font size will be assumed if the current line is empty, regardless of useFontSizeAsHeight.

AddText(string)

Appends text to this TextBuilder.

public void AddText(string text)

Parameters

text string

The text to append.

HasAvailableSpace(float)

Whether there is enough space in the available text bounds.

protected virtual bool HasAvailableSpace(float length)

Parameters

length float

The space requested.

Returns

bool

OnWidthExceeded()

Invoked when a character is being added that exceeds the maximum width of the text bounds.

protected virtual void OnWidthExceeded()

Remarks

The character will not continue being added if CanAddCharacters is changed during this invocation.

RemoveLastCharacter()

Removes the last character added to this TextBuilder. If the character is the first character on a new line, the new line is also removed.

public void RemoveLastCharacter()

Reset()

Resets this TextBuilder to a default state.

public virtual void Reset()
